function.description:
Returns a string, element or a list of node sub-elements from the specified node `element` as matched by the string `csspath`, a CSS Selector path. Both arguments are mandatory.
For more information about the CSS Selector syntax and available CSS path functions look here:
http://www.w3schools.com/cssref/css_selectors.asp
